Desc.entry: Martial arts classes for adults and children aged 6 years and over. Kick boxing is a combination of Thai boxing, boxing, tae kwon do and ju-jitsu. Offers group bookings for small groups of up to 8 people and private lessons (pre-booked), as well as normal classes for children and adults. Classes taught by a qualified school teacher, police checked, CRB and DFE registered. Classes taught by the ex Midland Area Champion. Gradings held at regular intervals. Participates in tournaments in both full and semi-contact at regional and national level. Holds fight promotions at regular intervals throughout the year and an annual social/award night in November.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon 7-8.30pm (fighters class), 8.30-9.30pm (beginners), Thurs 7.30-8.30pm (women only, pre-booked only), 8.30-9.30pm (beginners), Fri 6.30-7.30pm (open mixed ability), 7.30-8.30pm (fighting class), Sundays (private classes, pre-booked only); group sessions available other days, please telephone to book
Tues & Thurs 7.30-8.30pm (beginners), 8.30-9.30pm (graded), term- time only please telephone to confirm times

category.entry: MARTIAL ARTS - COMBINATION, KICK BOXING AND THAI BOXING
